name: Madame Praevalette
description:
In this dystopian cyber-endless runner, play as a 'cyboy' in a world ruled by a class of female dominatrices.  It is your job to collect resources for the mistress to secure a spot in the reproductive world hierarchies.  Perhaps your mistress will find favor with you and have your children, taking you out of the race for resources and securing a comfortable life for yourself after all your hard work. 

But for now. . . 

RUN!

Game Controls: 

Spacebar to jump - longer hold = longer jump height

Press Spacebar again while in the air to get a short second jump

Features Coming Soon:

Jetpack powerups

Cyboy money for upgrades

Settings menu & difficulty choices

Upgrades menu
